pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===============================================================Tools to trace cryoEM SPA processing results through EPU output===============================================================Installation------------An installation of `PostgreSQL <https://www.postgresql.org>`_ is required. The easiest way is to work in a ``conda`` environment and simply run ``conda install postgresql``.After installation run .. code:: bash smartem.init -d <path/to/where/data/will/go>This will run basic database setup. Upon completion this should suggest running a command to set the environment variable ``SMARTEM_CREDENTIALS`` which will setup database access credentials for you. The database server is started with.. code:: bash smartem.start -d <path/to/where/data/will/go>and once you no longer need the server it can be stopped with .. code:: bash smartem.stop -d <path/to/where/data/will/go>The ``smartem`` GUI can be launched (if there is a database server running) with .. code:: bash smartem.launch
